### SizeOnly {#a516c6319797ab7f25b21cde3992c3284}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="bool llvm::GlobalMergeOptions::SizeOnly = false">
Whether we should try to optimize for size only.

Currently, this applies a dead simple heuristic: only consider globals used in minsize functions for merging. FIXME: This could learn about optsize, and be used in the cost model.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/globalmerge-h/#l00040">40</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/globalmerge-h">GlobalMerge.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
